Welcome to sparksneeze's documentation!
========================================

**sparksneeze** is a Python library tool that can process common Data Warehouse transformations to supported targets. 

It is still in early development, it is not recommended using it in any kind of production environment.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   introduction
   installation
   usage
   strategies
   strategy-comparison
   schema-evolution
   metadata
   api
   cli

Quick Start
-----------

Install sparksneeze:

.. code-block:: bash

   uv add sparksneeze

Use as a library or as cli.
